title: I'm honestly fine with camille being overpowered
body: But if shes broken, I don't even know dude. Like idk about you, but im not prepared for some second lee sin bullshit to pop up again, seriously. If shes going to be problematic, honestly just delete her, don't even try to balance.

replies.body: I would not say she is over powered but then I am not a rank match player I imagine if you got. Good build for her like all champs she be insane but for a day to day match I yet to be over powered by a cam yet I seen Nightblur match with cam and as usual she's one those that can wipe a entire group out the weakness that atleast one person has said to me is she has bad time with Ad champs each game I played against her or with her she either fed or not so much tribute yet most still learning her I don't think deleteling her be a good ideal that be like saying delete all the other op champs who go unnoticed 99% time anyway
